tool_description: Analyzes vendor financial health by calculating key ratios, assessing creditworthiness, and determining financial capacity for contract execution.

annual_revenue.description: Most recent annual revenue in USD

years_in_business.description: Number of years company has been operating

contract_value_threshold.description: Maximum expected contract value for capacity assessment

assessment_type.description: Type of financial assessment: basic, comprehensive, specialized

error_messages: Invalid financial data: Revenue, assets, and liabilities must be positive numbers.
Inconsistent balance sheet: Total assets should generally align with total liabilities plus equity.
Credit score out of range: Provide a credit score between 300 and 850.
Registration not found: The provided registration_id does not exist.
Assessment type invalid: Use one of [basic, comprehensive, specialized].
Insufficient operating history: Company must have at least 1 year of operating history.
usage: Provide registration_id and complete financial data including revenue, assets, liabilities, and operating history. Optionally include credit_score and contract_value_threshold for enhanced assessment.

risk_rating.description: Financial risk category (low, medium, high, critical)

liquidity_ratio.description: Current assets to current liabilities ratio

capacity_rating.description: Contract execution capacity (excellent, good, fair, poor)
